titleInfo.title: [Letter] 1848 Oct. 2, South Hanover College, I[ndian]a [to] E[thel] H[enry] Porter

subject.topic: Porter, Edward E.; Porter, Ethel H.

mods.note: This document is a letter written by Edward E. Porter to his father, Ethel Henry Porter, on October 2, 1848. In the letter, Edward discusses seeing his father on a boat, the `Palo Alto` as he passed by, events going on at college, trips he has recently taken, and the need for Ethel to send some of his belongings to him at school.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
